recipesJson.name: Vanilla Waffle Cone
recipesJson.author: soulchkn
recipesJson.description:
A Waffle Cone, filled with silky delicious Vanilla Soft Serve Ice Cream.
I'm very happy how this turned out.
Enjoy! :)

reviews.text: Tastes of maple. Like you didn’t have a waffle cone for your vanilla ice cream, so you just used a waffle, AFTER the waffle already had Ms. Butterworth’s all over it. Which I think is delicious, but really misses the mark for vanilla ice cream in a NORMAL waffle cone that normal people eat, which don’t have syrup on them.
